profile.name: Mohit Paddhariya
profile.tagline: Building scalable and innovative web solutions
profile.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in MERN stack, cloud technologies, and open source contributions. Experienced in building scalable web applications and mobile solutions.

about: Building web applications that actually work! Currently deep into full-stack development and cloud architecture, Love tinkering with performance optimization and scalable deployments. Big open-source enthusiast you'll find me contributing to projects that make web development more accessible to everyone. Passionate about crafting efficient solutions and implementing innovative features that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description:
Providing end-to-end development solutions for diverse clients:
- Building custom web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
- Developing mobile applications with focus on performance and user experience
- Implementing scalable cloud solutions using AWS and GCP
- Offering technical consultation for architecture decisions

experience.title: Full Stack Intern
experience.description:
Led development of multiple high-impact projects including:
- Engineered a marketplace backend using Node.js and SQL, implementing robust APIs and security measures
- Developed an Android application for Bricks R US, integrating PHP backend with MongoDB for improved data management
- Designed and implemented responsive web UI for Velriders using Laravel and Bootstrap, enhancing user experience

projects.name: ByteCode
projects.description: Created a feature-rich MERN stack blogging platform with a modern WYSIWYG editor, supporting markdown, code highlighting, and media embedding. Integrated OAuth2 authentication and robust content management system.
highlights: Rich text editing with code highlighting

projects.name: Film Fusion
projects.description: Developed a full-featured movie streaming platform using Laravel with a custom-built authentication system including email verification. Implemented payment gateway integration with Stripe using AJAX. Built a secure admin panel for uploading movies, managing users, subscriptions, and purchases, all handled with native HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without any component libraries.
highlights: Built custom auth with email verification and password reset
Integrated Stripe payments via AJAX for smooth transactions
Developed admin panel to manage movies, users, and subscriptions
Implemented secure subscription purchase and management

projects.name: Filekko
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive resource-sharing platform featuring an intuitive interface for storing and managing files and notes. Implemented real-time collaboration features, secure file storage, and robust user authentication.

openSource.name: Apache Beam
openSource.description: Made significant contributions to Apache Beam's SQL package, substantially improving test coverage from 35% to 70%. Implemented comprehensive test suites and fixed several critical bugs.

openSource.name: Monkeytype
openSource.description: Enhanced data integrity by refactoring JSON parsing implementation with comprehensive schema validation, improving error handling and data consistency.
openSource.impact: Improved data reliability and reduced errors

openSource.name: Internet Archive's Open Library
openSource.description: Enhanced platform performance by implementing lazy loading for Related Books Carousels, significantly improving page load times and user experience.
openSource.impact: Reduced page load time and improved user experience
